author: Julie Hyman
title: Bitcoin outlook: What comes next after 'institutional adoption'
description: Bitcoin's (BTC-USD) "institutional adoption" is growing as financial tools make cryptocurrency more usable. Chris Kline, BitcoinIRA COO and co-founder, joins...
content: The crypto community for so long has been calling for institutional adoption, right? And institutional adoption finally seems to be happening. So how do you now look at the institutional ownership veâ€¦ [+2496 chars]
